wblut.hemesh

Class HEM_Extrude

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Machine
      • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Modifier
        • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Extrude

  • public class HEM_Extrude
extends HEM_Modifier
    Extrudes and scales a face along its face normal.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
